scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-nested-remote/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-nested-remote/webpack.config.js --mode development --port 3005
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli serve --config apps/react-ts-nested-remote/webpack.config.js --mode production --port 3005 --no-hot
